short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over comments link to view all comments and their replies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reddit Extension rComments lets you to explore a post's comments and their replies just by hovering over the comments link of a post - no need to open new tabs or wait for additional page loads. Want to check out the top comment? The replies? Just hover over the comments link and the checkout any comment you'd like!
